description: Standard form for describing how AI agents should evaluate and select entities for Invocation.

id.description: Unique identifier for the decision pathway.

domain.description: Domain context (e.g., retail, insurance, automotive, hospitality, generic).

intent_type.description: Type of user intent this pathway is designed for (e.g., product_comparison, plan_recommendation).

primary_entity_class.description: Main entity type involved in the decision.

constraints.description: List of constraints the agent must respect (e.g., budget_max, safety_priority).

signals.description: List of signal names used in this pathway.

decision_strategy.description: How the agent should combine signals and constraints.

weights.description: Optional weight map where each key is a signal name and each value is a weight from 0.0 to 1.0.

rules.description: Optional rule set for hard constraints (e.g., must have safety_score >= 4.5).

outcome_type.description: Expected output format (e.g., ranked_recommendation, best_fit_plan, top_choice_with_rationale).

explanation_required.description: Whether the agent should provide a human-readable explanation of the decision.
